name: Hide and rob
description:
It's a first person game, where the player have infiltrate houses in order to steal the stuff inside with another phase where you can sell the goods.

The buyer can be the one you robed so be careful they can grow suspicious of you and avoid making a deal with you.

The dynamic we want to feel with this game is the one of a Rogue-lite. The money you will earn with your sales can be used to improves your skills and upgrade the shop you own at the thief guild.

This not yet implemented but we want to build a system procedural generation for the houses, in order to make them more unique !

This game was make for the Global Game Jam 2021.

Worker : Laura Bréquigny, Nolan Demars, Baptiste Airiaud
